export T.foo T.__bar
-- x.go --
package p

type T struct {
	foo, __bar int
}

var _ = T{}.foo
var _ = T{}.__bar
var _ = T{
	foo: 1,
	__bar: 2,
}
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -1,12 +1,12 @@
 package p

 type T struct {
-	foo, __bar int
+	Foo, Bar int
 }

-var _ = T{}.foo
-var _ = T{}.__bar
+var _ = T{}.Foo
+var _ = T{}.Bar
 var _ = T{
-	foo: 1,
-	__bar: 2,
+	Foo: 1,
+	Bar: 2,
 }
